Question: BL I & C CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
LG

Product 1: Signature OLED T

 - 77" transparent 4K OLED display
 - See-through when off
 - Contrast setting for conventional OLED look

Alienware

Product 2: 32-inch 4K QD-OLED Gaming Monitor

 - Supports Dolby Vision
 - 240Hz refresh rate

Panasonic

Product 3: LUMIX S 100mm F2.8 MACRO Lens

 - Compatible with L-Mount system
 - Designed for professional use
Summary_cn:
LG

产品1：Signature OLED T

 - 77英寸透明4K OLED显示屏
 - 关闭时透明可见
 - 可调节对比度以达到传统OLED外观

Alienware

产品2：32英寸4K QD-OLED游戏显示器

 - 支持Dolby Vision
 - 240Hz刷新率

Panasonic

产品3：LUMIX S 100mm F2.8 微距镜头

 - 兼容L-Mount系统
 - 专为专业使用设计
